name: EDIT_CLM_LINES
description: Stores detailed information of the edited claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EC_LINES_GEN
columns.description: Stores the generation number of the audit for each line.

columns.name: EC_LINES_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the claim type for the claim being edited.

columns.name: EC_LINES_LN_NUM
columns.description: Stores the edit claim lines line number.
